      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="980760257684221953" id="stream-item-tweet-980760257684221953" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;980760257684221953&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="978601429836488705" id="stream-item-tweet-978601429836488705" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;978601429836488705&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

</div>

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweet</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-975509104725807105">

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Sad news today, Stephen William Hawking CH CBE FRS FRSA moves on from this world.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Tories cannot continue to ignore the real human cost of austerity: desperate families, services at breaking point and local councils on the verge of bankruptcy. 
Read <a href="/johnmcdonnellMP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="77234984"><s>@</s><b>johnmcdonnellMP</b></a>'s blog in response to the <a href="/hashtag/SpringStatement?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SpringStatement</b></a>, and pass it on <a href="https://t.co/ThZJbD9NnW" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://labour.org.uk/latest/stories/johnmcdonnell-springstatement/?source=johnmcblog&amp;subsource=twitter&amp;utm_medium=twitter&amp;utm_source=post&amp;utm_campaign=johnmcblog" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://labour.org.uk/latest/stories/johnmcdonnell-springstatement/?source=johnmcblog&amp;subsource=twitter&amp;utm_medium=twitter&amp;utm_source=post&amp;utm_campaign=johnmcblog"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">labour.org.uk/latest/stories</span><span class="invisible">/johnmcdonnell-springstatement/?source=johnmcblog&amp;subsource=twitter&amp;utm_medium=twitter&amp;utm_source=post&amp;utm_campaign=johnmcblog</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So, many of you know that <a href="/AngelaRayner" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="222748037"><s>@</s><b>AngelaRayner</b></a> is one of my heroes. We need to stand up for our children  sign this <a href="https://t.co/pt3CFkqnk0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://action.labour.org.uk/page/s/protect-free-school-meal" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://action.labour.org.uk/page/s/protect-free-school-meal"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">action.labour.org.uk/page/s/protect</span><span class="invisible">-free-school-meal</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">

BUT new research shows that many Councils have now reached the point where it wont plug Government funding reductions to prevent services being cut. <img class="Emoji Emoji--forText" src="https://abs.twimg.com/emoji/v2/72x72/2702.png" draggable="false" alt="" title="Scissors" aria-label="Emoji: Scissors" />

      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>

</div>

  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gerrie Messer Retweeted The Labour Party</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">The only time you can legitimately put common and sense in the same sentence<a href="https://t.co/noc6AlVn1i" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/968191450939719680" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/968191450939719680"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/968191450939719680</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">The Labour Party</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>UKLabour</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Weve got a common sense approach to Brexit that puts jobs first.
Have you seen <span class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>JeremyCorbyn</b></span>s speech yet? Pass it on 
<span data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>CorbynSpeech</b></span> <span class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/xurWiPcvtH</span></div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gerrie Messer Retweeted Debbie Abrahams MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">People still don't understand that some people (including me) find getting about on the Tube network incredibly difficult. When you are rushing about, please have consideration to people with sight, hearing and mobility disabilities.<a href="https://t.co/3B05KDzBNs" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/Debbie_abrahams/status/968038526637010944" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/Debbie_abrahams/status/968038526637010944"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/Debbie_abraham</span><span class="invisible">s/status/968038526637010944</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Gerrie Messer added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">

    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="968038526637010944" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Debbie_abrahams" data-user-id="225857392" href="/Debbie_abrahams/status/968038526637010944" data-conversation-id="968038526637010944" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Debbie Abrahams MP</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Debbie_abrahams</b></span>
  </div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Local Councils should exist to improve the lives of local people. Sadly, in my experience, this is not the case. Local Councils make decisions that benefit corporations, building firms or visitors and rarely consider what residents want OR need.</p>
</div>

        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Last year Virgin Care had a turnover of 200m, and made 8m profit

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gerrie Messer Retweeted CrossCountry trains</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Never mind HS2 and a 20 minute reduction to journey time! We, in the South West DEMAND electrification and a reliable service! A service that can run come rain,sun or snow!<a href="https://t.co/KU9eUlPVA2" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/CrossCountryUK/status/967413784007540737" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/CrossCountryUK/status/967413784007540737"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/CrossCountryUK</span><span class="invisible">/status/967413784007540737</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Gerrie Messer added,</p>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gerrie Messer Retweeted Devon Live News</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Proud to show my support for OUR NHS in Torquay today
<a href="/hashtag/SaveOurNHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SaveOurNHS</b></a><a href="https://t.co/7tsApaWxn1" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/DevonLiveNews/status/967425134897213440" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/DevonLiveNews/status/967425134897213440"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/DevonLiveNews/</span><span class="invisible">status/967425134897213440</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Awesome Rally, March and protest in Torquay this morning. <a href="/hashtag/SaveOurNHS?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>SaveOurNHS</b></a> <a href="/TorbayTUC" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1166699053"><s>@</s><b>TorbayTUC</b></a> <a href="/TorbaySDevonNHS" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="407725589"><s>@</s><b>TorbaySDevonNHS</b></a> <a href="/Labour4Totnes" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="1295561761"><s>@</s><b>Labour4Totnes</b></a> <a href="/LabourCornwall" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="224559297"><s>@</s><b>LabourCornwall</b></a> Thank you to Paul Farmer for joining us</p>
</div>

      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-967335137624100864">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Still no explicit commitment from government to tackle third party harassment. They must also act to protect women bound by non disclosure agreements who live in fear of coming forward. Women need protection in the workplace and this government must take action <a href="/hashtag/BringBackSec40?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>BringBackSec40</b></a><a href="https://t.co/TpbKaA7iBF" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/TpbKaA7iBF</a></p>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

    </span>
  </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">

  </button>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Chuka pressed the PM to commit to securing workers rights when we leave the EU, answer was weak and gives little comfort to working people<a href="https://t.co/RZT7TN10zn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/chukaumunna/status/942789236129923072" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/chukaumunna/status/942789236129923072"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/chukaumunna/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/942789236129923072</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Since <a href="/Conservatives" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14281853"><s>@</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> came to power, funding for early intervention has fallen by 55%, with increasing numbers of children requiring emergency protection.

Tonight I'm supporting <a href="/UKLabour" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="14291684"><s>@</s><b>UKLabour</b></a> amendments for 4.7bn currently set aside for bankers spent protecting vulnerable children</p>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="938547883535753216" id="stream-item-tweet-938547883535753216" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;938547883535753216&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Gerrie Messer Retweeted Luke Pollard MP</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">This has to stop!<a href="https://t.co/ImYwR6BlAJ" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/LukePollard/status/938506643834318848" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/LukePollard/status/938506643834318848"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/LukePollard/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/938506643834318848</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

</small>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The judgement quashing employment tribunal fees is a MASSIVE win for workers. Congrats to <a href="/unisontweets" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="15230159"><s>@</s><b>unisontweets</b></a> for doggedly pursuing this. <a href="/hashtag/ETfees?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ETfees</b></a></p>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I cannot possibly understand how an MP in this day and age would think it was acceptable to use such a phrase<a href="https://t.co/KsFEqhegCM" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/labourpress/status/884448471499100162" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/labourpress/status/884448471499100162"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/labourpress/st</span><span class="invisible">atus/884448471499100162</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="513">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">513</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Luke Pollard MP Retweeted Jeremy Corbyn</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Good to see the Leader out with the fishing community. Fishing was screwed over on way into Europe, can't be on the way out too<a href="https://t.co/aGj0NNdXH0" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/881151587883905025" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/status/881151587883905025"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/jeremycorbyn/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/881151587883905025</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">So, a special deal is done for public services in NI. In return, their MPs block help for public servants in England. How can that be right?</p>

    <div class="dropdown">

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">
        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Angela Rayner Retweeted Mirror Politics</p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="2629">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">2.6K</span>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount" data-tweet-stat-count="4691">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">4.7K</span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    

    

  </div>

</li><li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="873968933866549248" id="stream-item-tweet-873968933866549248" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;873968933866549248&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/tom_watson" data-user-id="14190551">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">A grubby deal for a coalition of chaos.<a href="https://t.co/hqqDiPbeTm" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/guardiananushka/status/873607354759118848" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/guardiananushka/status/873607354759118848"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/guardiananushk</span><span class="invisible">a/status/873607354759118848</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Tom Watson added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

    </a>

          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">No 10 say agreement DUP will support the Conservative Government on a Confidence and Supply basis when Parliament returns next week.</div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">On the campaign trail in Stoke Newington yesterday.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">In this election, Theresa May underestimated the Labour Party. And more importantly: she underestimated you. Share <a href="/jeremycorbyn" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="117777690"><s>@</s><b>jeremycorbyn</b></a>s message.<a href="https://t.co/up2dihpmXU" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/up2dihpmXU</a></p>
</div>

    </div>

        <div class="PlayableMedia-externalUrlBlockContent">
          <div class="PlayableMedia-title">Jeremy Corbyn's message to you, our supporters</div>
          <div class="PlayableMedia-description">To everyone who voted for Labour yesterday  your vote for us was a vote for change, a vote for our country, and a vote for hope. Theresa May underestimated our party and she underestimated you.</div>

    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>

    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">I am temporarily suspending tweeting in the light of events in London and send our love to all those involved. <a href="/hashtag/LondonStrong?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>LondonStrong</b></a></p>

        <div class="feedback-action" data-feedback-type="DontLike" data-feedback-url="">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Vote Labour in Totnes for the many: state pensioners, young people, women &amp; families, the low paid, those on benefits, everyone who uses NHS<a href="https://t.co/4sRg2ihI2W" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/871058162635350016" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/UKLabour/status/871058162635350016"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/UKLabour/statu</span><span class="invisible">s/871058162635350016</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

  <div class="tweet js-stream-tweet js-actionable-tweet js-profile-popup-actionable dismissible-content&#10;       original-tweet js-original-tweet&#10;      &#10;      &#10;       &#10;" data-tweet-id="870264396181852163" data-item-id="870264396181852163" data-permalink-path="/GerriePPCTotnes/status/870264396181852163" data-conversation-id="870264396181852163" data-tweet-nonce="870264396181852163-8b34831d-43a9-465e-b785-aca5e307fb9d" data-tweet-stat-initialized="true" data-screen-name="GerriePPCTotnes" data-name="Gerrie Messer" data-user-id="860159801057214465" data-you-follow="false" data-follows-you="false" data-you-block="false" data-reply-to-users-json="[{&quot;id_str&quot;:&quot;860159801057214465&quot;,&quot;screen_name&quot;:&quot;GerriePPCTotnes&quot;,&quot;name&quot;:&quot;Gerrie Messer&quot;,&quot;emojified_name&quot;:{&quot;text&quot;:&quot;Gerrie Messer&quot;,&quot;emojified_text_as_html&quot;:&quot;Gerrie Messer&quot;}}]" data-disclosure-type="">

    <div class="context">
      
      
    </div>

    <div class="content">
      

      

      
      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/GerriePPCTotnes" data-user-id="860159801057214465">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/860161007297101824/oPTXco8F_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">I will oppose the return of fox hunting. It's cruel, barbaric and has no place in the 21st century<a href="https://t.co/t9tyuITn73" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/angelarayner/status/868557649356488705" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/angelarayner/status/868557649356488705"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/angelarayner/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/868557649356488705</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>

    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">Angela Rayner</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>AngelaRayner</b></span>
  </div>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Tim Roache GMB Retweeted GMB UNION</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Disgraceful. Not on our watch. Morally wrong and devoid of all common sense.<a href="https://t.co/MXwFKxJjIi" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/gmb_union/status/868722424954724352" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/gmb_union/status/868722424954724352"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/gmb_union/stat</span><span class="invisible">us/868722424954724352</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Tim Roache GMB added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/GMB_union/status/868722424954724352" data-conversation-id="868722424954724352" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="868722424954724352" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="GMB_union" data-user-id="330387008" href="/GMB_union/status/868722424954724352" data-conversation-id="868722424954724352" tabindex="0">
      <div class="tweet-content">
            <div class="QuoteMedia">

      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Reply</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero ">
        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-868781007511724032">

    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">6</span>
  </span>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">As a mark of repect, due to the events in Manchester, no political activity from me today. <a href="/hashtag/ManchesterStrong?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ManchesterStrong</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/ManchesterArenaAttack?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>ManchesterArenaAttack</b></a></p>

      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweeted</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount ProfileTweet-actionCount--isZero">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
  </span>

  </button>
</div>


    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--favorite js-toggleState">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-favorite-count-aria-864246600826310656">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Like</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">1</span>

  </button>
</div>

Make sure you have your voice heard in <a href="/hashtag/GE2017?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2017</b></a>, find out voting is so important: <a href="https://t.co/OTbnjNj41p" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="http://votingcounts.org.uk/why-should-you" class="twitter-timeline-link" target="_blank" title="http://votingcounts.org.uk/why-should-you"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">http://</span><span class="js-display-url">votingcounts.org.uk/why-should-you</span><span class="invisible"></span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a><a href="https://t.co/AcY9QbFPL4" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/AcY9QbFPL4</a></p>

  </div>

  <div class="ProfileTweet-actionList js-actions" role="group" aria-label="Tweet actions">
    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--reply">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton js-actionButton js-actionReply" data-modal="ProfileTweet-reply" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-reply-count-aria-862738107212365829">

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">

  </span>

          <p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="1">Frances O'Grady Retweeted TradesUnionCongress</p>


<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">British workers have endured the longest pay squeeze since Victorian times. And now even more pain is on the horizon<a href="https://t.co/kZP4tlUnEY" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/The_TUC/status/862178135130783744" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/The_TUC/status/862178135130783744"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/The_TUC/status</span><span class="invisible">/862178135130783744</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Frances O'Grady added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">

   <div id="geo-disabled-dropdown">

  <div class="dropdown-caret">

    <span class="caret-inner"></span>
  </div>
  <ul>
    <li class="geo-not-enabled-yet">
      <h2>Tweet with a location</h2>
      <p>
        You can add location information to your Tweets, such as your city or precise location, from the web and via third-party applications. You always have the option to delete your Tweet location history.
        <a href="http://support.twitter.com/forums/26810/entries/78525" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Learn more</a>
      </p>
      <div>
        <button type="button" class="geo-turn-on EdgeButton EdgeButton--primary">Turn on</button>
        <button type="button" class="geo-not-now EdgeButton EdgeButton--secondary">Not now</button>
      </div>
    </li>
  </ul>
</div>

    <script nonce="" id="track-ttft-body-script">
  if(window.ttft){
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('page', document.getElementById('swift-page-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('section', document.getElementById('swift-section-name').getAttribute('content'));
    window.ttft.recordMilestone('client_record_time', window.ttft.now());
  }
</script>
